translation.Special thanks to Tulsa Public Schools f: Un agradecimiento especial a las Escuelas Públicas de Tulsa por su apoyo y colaboración en este proyecto. El Programa de Asistencia Nutricional Suplementaria (SNAP) es un programa federal, administrado por la oficina del Departamento de Servicios Humanos de Oklahoma (OKDHS). Para obtener más información sobre OKDHS, visite <1>okdhs.org</1> o llame al (877) 751-2972.
translation.Tell us some information about the membe: Cuéntanos algo sobre los miembros de tu familia.
translation.Who is the head of your household?: ¿Quién es el jefe de tu hogar?
translation.Does the head of household have a Social: ~Does the head of household have a Social Security Number?~
translation.How many adults live in your home? <1>(t: ¿Cuántos adultos viven en tu casa? <1>(total de adultos en el hogar mayores de 18 años, incluido usted)</1>
translation.How many adults <1>over the age of 60</1: ~How many adults <1>over the age of 60</1> live in your home?~
translation.How many children <1>under the age of 18: ~How many children <1>under the age of 18</1> live in your home?~
translation.Let us know how we can get in touch with: Háganos saber cómo podemos ponernos en contacto con usted.
translation.Please select the school your child atte: ~Please select the school your child attends:~
translation.Find out if you are eligible for food as: Averigüe si es elegible para recibir asistencia alimentaria.
translation.We will connect you with a Tulsa Public: Lo conectaremos con un representante de las Escuelas Públicas de Tulsa que ...
translation.You may be eligible to receive SNAP bene: ~You may be eligible to receive SNAP benefits!~
translation.Based on the information you provided yo: ~Based on the information you provided you and your family may be eligible to receive SNAP benefits.~
translation.You will be contacted by a SNAP trained: ~You will be contacted by a SNAP trained school staff member within three business days to assist you with the SNAP application.~
translation.Information you will need when applying: ~Information you will need when applying for SNAP benefits:~
translation.All household members: name, date of bir: ~All household members: name, date of birth, social security number (if available)~
translation.Income (if applicable): paycheck stubs,: ~Income (if applicable): paycheck stubs, child support, alimony, social security payments, etc.~
translation.You may <1>not</1> be eligible to receiv: ~You may <1>not</1> be eligible to receive SNAP benefits!~
translation.Based on the information you provided yo: ~Based on the information you provided you and your family may not be eligible to receive SNAP benefits. Please know there are additional resources available to assist you and your family.~
translation.You will be contacted by a school staff: ~You will be contacted by a school staff member within three business days to assist you with additional resources.~
